description:
Issun Boushi is very small. A great snake threatens the villagers of Onnagawadani. A Bodhisattva calls the rain.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Issunboushi / Onnagawadani no Daija / Amegoi Bosatsu
Little One Inch / The Great Snake of Onnagawadani / The Rain-Calling Bodhisattva
一寸法師 / 女川谷の大蛇 / 雨ごい菩薩
